alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Nemaha; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 2:03AM CDT until April 20 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Nemaha County in northeastern Kansas... Eastern Washington County in north central Kansas... Marshall County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 203 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blue Rapids, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marysville, Blue Rapids, Frankfort, Hanover, Waterville, Centralia, Axtell, Beattie, Barnes, Summerfield, Vermillion, Oketo, Baileyville, Lillis and Bremen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
